description.en: The rich second-generation Chen Chen originally lived the life of a winner in life. Who knows that his family broke down overnight and his girlfriend ran away with him. The culprit was his best brother. . Just when Chen Chen was nearly killed by a car, the system mother fell from the sky, "Do you want revenge? That's called a tyrant~" Chen Chen, who was unwilling to die, endured the "humiliation" of being taken advantage of by this loli and got help. He conquered the world's learning hegemony system, in the new world after the collective human beings were subjugated to intelligence, embarked on an invincible flow of pretending to force life, and became a top talent in the all-round development of morality, intelligence, physical education, and labor. This complete revenge! Huh? I just want to fight monsters and upgrade, why are so many girls running with me? !
